channel.title: PKEmine -317
channel.description:
[SIZE=5]Hey guys! Today i will be showing of a friendly and potential server called [B]PKEmine[/B] It is a 317 (OSRS) based server with zulrah and other bosses that are popular on Oldschool Runescape.
The server has a driven coding team, friendly and professional staff. we are willing to expand our playerbase, some bosses and items are still under development.
We have a clean [B]teleporting tab[/B].
[IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/154h7nr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/2eyjdzm.png[/img]
[B]All bosses[/B] are perfectly working however we are actively working on new bosses.
[IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/aubii9.png[/img]
[B]OSRS items[/B] are added (we are tweaking some stats) Blowpipe, dragon warhammer, staff of the undead, trident, armadyl crossbow and so on...
[IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/sl79cl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/1ekmxv.png[/img]
A very nice forum with [B]highscores[/B].
[IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/35n6cm0.png[/img]
We strive to push out daily content for our players. Our coding team is working day and night to give the players the best experience.
Our forum: [URL=http://www.pkemine.com/forums/][forum][/URL]
Download the client: [URL=http://www.pkemine.com/PKEmine-OS.jar][B][Client][/B][/URL][/SIZE]

item.title: PKEmine -317
item.dc:creator: @magiix magiix
item.description:
@magiix wrote:

[SIZE=5]Hey guys!
Today i will be showing of a friendly and potential server called PKEmine
It is a 317 (OSRS) based server with zulrah and other bosses that are popular on Oldschool Runescape.

The server has a driven coding team, friendly and professional staff.
we are willing to expand our playerbase, some bosses and items are still under development.

We have a clean teleporting tab.

All bosses are perfectly working however we are actively working on new bosses.

OSRS items are added (we are tweaking some stats)
Blowpipe, dragon warhammer, staff of the undead, trident, armadyl crossbow and so on…

A very nice forum with highscores.

35n6cm0.png1254×906

We strive to push out daily content for our players.
Our coding team is working day and night to give the players the best experience.
